root.text:
This is the main hero section of the homepage. Our analysis shows:

1. The CTA button has low contrast (45:1 ratio)
2. Image load time is 2.3s (should be <1s)
3. Text overlaps with background on mobile viewports
4. 78% of users scroll past this section without engaging

rest.text:
Navigation analysis:

- Dropdown menus have 320ms delay (recommended <150ms)
- 42% of mobile users abandon during menu interaction
- Primary nav items have 4.2:1 contrast ratio (should be at least 4.5:1)

Product grid findings:

1. Card hover effects increase engagement by 28%
2. Missing price labels on 3/8 product cards
3. Filter options load asynchronously causing layout shift
4. Average time to select first product: 9.2s

Checkout flow issues:

- Form field validation happens only on submit (should be real-time)
- 34% abandonment at payment step
- Trust badges are below the fold on mobile
- Guest checkout option increases conversions by 22%

Footer recommendations:

1. Newsletter signup converts at 1.2% (industry avg: 3.5%)
2. Social icons are 28px (recommended 32-40px)
3. Missing sitemap link
4. Copyright info uses 10px font (should be â‰¥12px)
